paperstack.filesystem package#

Submodules#

paperstack.filesystem.config module#

Home to the Config class. This is where configuration is done.

class paperstack.filesystem.config.Config(config_path=None)#

Bases: object

Configuration class. Here we manage the configuration file and any read/write access.

Parameters

config_path (str, optional) – Path to config file. If not specified, will look in home directory.

config_path#
Type

str

get(section, key)#

Get value corresponding to a configuration item.

Parameters

  • section (str) –

  • key (str) –

Returns

Value of config item.

Return type

str

update(section, key, value)#

Update an item in the configuration (not written automatically).

Parameters

  • section (str) –

  • key (str) –

  • value (str) –

write()#

Write configuration to file.

paperstack.filesystem.file module#

Module that takes care of files and paths.

class paperstack.filesystem.file.File(path, is_directory=False)#

Bases: object

Here we provide convenience methods to deal with files.

Parameters

  • path (Path) –

  • is_directory (bool, optional) –

path#
Type

Path

is_directory#
Type

bool, optional

ensure()#

Ensure that path exists.

join(name)#

If path is a directory, then join with name to form a subdirectory. Otherwise, just return the path.

Parameters

name (str) – The child file or directory name.
